import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../assets/css/Login.css"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import baseUrl from "../../baseUrl"; const CreateProduct = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [currentTag, setCurrentTag] = useState('flower') const [error, setError] = useState({ show: false, title: "" }) const [data, setData] = useState({ title: "", description: "", tag: "", }) const handleSubmit = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() setData({...data, tag:currentTag, title: e.target.title.value, description: e.target.description}) console.log("DATA>>>>>>", data) const response = await fetch(`${baseUrl}/api/product/create/`,{ method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' }, body:JSON.stringify(data) }) console.log(response) if(response.status===201){ navigate("/dashboard") } } // console.log(data) const handleChange = (e) => { const imgg = e.target.files[0] if(imgg){ let formData = {...data} formData[e.target.name] = imgg setData(formData) } } const handleTag = (tag) => { setCurrentTag(tag) }; const handleCancel = () => { navigate("/dashboard"); }; return (

Create Product

)}
); }; export default CreateProduct;
